    • Method Detail

      • registerClient

        boolean registerClient(Client client)
        Delegates to the DAO layer the writing of users to the database (only if transferred data passes the validation).
        Parameters:
        client - we are want to write.
        Returns:
        true if writing is success, otherwise false.

      • registerTaxi

        boolean registerTaxi(Taxi taxi)
        Delegates to the DAO layer the writing of users to the database (only if transferred data passes the validation).
        Parameters:
        taxi - we are want to write/
        Returns:
        true if writing is success, otherwise false.

      • authorize

        User authorize(java.lang.String login,
               java.lang.String password)
        Authorizes user (client, taxi, admin). Delegates to the DAO layer the selecting the authorized user role.
        Parameters:
        login - of user we want to authorize.
        password - of user we want to authorize.
        Returns:
        role of the user if authorization is successful.

      • changeSessionStatus

        void changeSessionStatus(Taxi taxi)
        Changes the availability status of the taxi driver.
        Parameters:
        taxi - we want to change.
